products.discover_range: Discover our extensive range of high-quality Tunisian products
products.no_products_found: No products found matching your filters

products_hero.description: Discover our range of premium dates and derived products, carefully selected for their exceptional quality.

about.tradition_excellence: For many years, a tradition of excellence in Tunisian date production
about.mission_text_1: Tazart is a social enterprise specializing in drying and packaging fruits, particularly dates and dried figs. Our products are grown in the best conditions in Tunisia to ensure superior taste and quality.
about.mission_text_2: We reimagine our local products to offer consumers a culinary experience that is both authentic and exceptional.
about.respect_description: Our team is united by strong values of mutual respect and collaboration.
about.excellence_description: We are committed to maintaining the highest quality standards in all our products.
about.sustainability_description: Our commitment to the environment and local communities guides each of our actions.
about.production_description: We prioritize environmentally friendly production methods.
about.heritage_subtitle: Exploring our roots and traditions in Tunisian date production
about.heritage_text_1: The fig is an integral part of Berber culture and is called Tazart throughout the Berber-speaking world, which is where our company name comes from.
about.heritage_text_2: The TAZART brand was created at the heart of traditional and authentic Tunisian production, offering consumers an exceptional culinary experience based on dates and dried figs.
about.heritage_text_3: For figs, the harvest is dried using modern techniques adapted to current hygiene standards, then moves to the packaging stage, like our natural 'Deglet Nour' dates, to be marketed in various forms through a network of more than 500 distributors.
about.history_text_1: For more than 20 years, we have been committed to providing the best dates from Tunisia to the four corners of the world. Our passion for quality and our expertise in selecting the best varieties have allowed us to become a leader in the export of premium dates.
about.history_text_2: Each date we select tells a story of tradition, quality, and excellence. Our commitment to sustainability and innovation enables us to maintain the highest quality standards.
about.heritage_footer: Building on our heritage to create an exceptional future

contact.intro_b2b: Our team is ready to answer all your questions. Don't hesitate to contact us, we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.intro_b2c: Our consumer service is at your disposal for any questions or complaints about our products.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.thank_you_b2b: Your message has been successfully sent. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.thank_you_b2c: Your complaint has been successfully sent. Our consumer service will contact you within 48 hours.

footer.company_description: TAZART is your trusted source for dates of the highest quality. For many years, we have been selecting the best varieties to offer you an exceptional taste experience.

resellers.title: Our Resellers
resellers.subtitle: Discover where to find our products throughout Tunisia. Our network of official resellers guarantees quality and service.
resellers.discover_network: Discover our network of official resellers where you can buy our quality products throughout Tunisia.
resellers.distribution_description: Find our products at the best points of sale throughout Tunisia. Our partners have been carefully selected to ensure optimal availability.
resellers.and_many_more: ... and more than 500 other resellers across Tunisia

supplier_descriptions.benyaghlen: A premium department store chain offering high-quality Tunisian products, including our complete range of dates and fig products.
supplier_descriptions.carrefour: International hypermarket chain where you can find our selection of dates and fig products in the specialty food section.
supplier_descriptions.geant: Major retailer with locations across Tunisia, featuring our products in their gourmet food department.
supplier_descriptions.monoprix: Upscale supermarket chain offering a curated selection of our premium dates and fig products.

made_in_tunisia.title: 100% Made in Tunisia
made_in_tunisia.description: Our dates are lovingly grown in Tunisian oases, where the unique climate and traditional know-how combine to produce fruits of exceptional quality. Each date is carefully selected and packaged to preserve its freshness and authentic taste.
made_in_tunisia.region_description: Located in southern Tunisia, Douz is known as 'the gateway to the desert' and produces the finest dates in the world thanks to its unique arid climate and ancestral expertise.
made_in_tunisia.region_footer: Famous for its date palms that produce fruits of incomparable sweetness and quality.

dates_benefits.title: Why choose our dates?
dates_benefits.subtitle: Discover the exceptional benefits of our premium dates, carefully selected to offer you the best of nature.
dates_benefits.click_info: Click on the circles for more details about each benefit
dates_benefits.quote: Regular consumption of dates as part of a balanced diet contributes to better overall health.

nutrition.title: Exceptional Nutritional Richness
nutrition.description: Our dates contain a remarkable concentration of essential nutrients that support your overall health.

energy.title: Natural Energy Source
energy.description: Thanks to their natural carbohydrate content, our dates provide you with sustainable energy throughout the day.

digestive.title: Digestive Support
digestive.description: The dietary fibers present in our dates promote healthy digestion and regular intestinal transit.

antioxidant.title: Antioxidant Properties
antioxidant.description: Rich in antioxidants, our dates fight free radicals and contribute to cellular protection.

mineral.title: Mineral Balance
mineral.description: The potassium and other minerals contained in our dates support cardiovascular and muscular health.

fiber.title: Rich in fiber
fiber.content:
Dates are exceptionally rich in dietary fiber, with about 7 grams of fiber per 100 grams of dates. These fibers are essential for:

  • Digestive health and intestinal transit
  • Blood sugar control
  • The feeling of satiety
  • Cholesterol reduction

The soluble and insoluble fibers present in dates help maintain a healthy digestive system and prevent various digestive diseases.

potassium.title: Potassium source
potassium.content:
Dates are an excellent source of potassium, containing about 696 mg per 100 grams. Potassium is crucial for:

  • Blood pressure regulation
  • Muscle function
  • Nerve transmission
  • The body's water balance

A diet rich in potassium helps maintain good cardiovascular health and prevent hypertension.

energy.title: Energy booster
energy.content:
Dates are an excellent natural energy booster thanks to:

  • Their high content of natural carbohydrates
  • Their moderate glycemic index
  • Their richness in B vitamins
  • Their content of essential minerals

Ideal for athletes and active people, dates provide sustainable energy without significant glycemic spikes.

superfood.title: Superfood
superfood.content:
Dates are considered a superfood due to their exceptional nutritional profile:

  • Rich in antioxidants
  • Source of essential minerals
  • Contain anti-inflammatory compounds
  • Provide fibers and vitamins

Their regular consumption contributes to a balanced and healthy diet.

antioxidants.title: Antioxidants
antioxidants.content:
Dates are rich in antioxidants, including:

  • Flavonoids
  • Carotenoids
  • Phenolic compounds
  • Vitamin E

These antioxidants help fight oxidative stress and free radicals, thus contributing to the prevention of many chronic diseases.

vitamins.title: Vitamins B1, B2, B3
vitamins.content:
Dates are an important source of B vitamins:

  • B1 (Thiamine): essential for energy metabolism
  • B2 (Riboflavin): important for cellular energy production
  • B3 (Niacin): crucial for nervous system health

These vitamins are essential for the proper functioning of metabolism and the nervous system.

meta.title: Our Certifications | Tazart - Certified Quality
meta.description: Discover Tazart's quality certifications, guaranteeing the excellence of our traditional Tunisian products.

certifications.title: Our Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Discover our certifications that demonstrate our commitment to excellence and quality.

fssc_22000.title: Certification Excellence
fssc_22000.description: Our FSSC 22000 certification demonstrates our commitment to food safety and the highest quality standards. This certification ensures that our food safety management system meets the most stringent international requirements for packaging whole dates and sun-dried figs.

iso_22000.title: ISO 22000 Certification
iso_22000.description: Our ISO 22000 certification demonstrates our commitment to food safety and product quality. This international standard ensures that we follow best practices in food safety throughout our production chain.

bio.title: Organic Agriculture
bio.description: Our Organic certification guarantees 100% natural products, grown with respect for the environment. We are committed to maintaining sustainable and nature-friendly agricultural practices to offer products of the highest quality.

quality_statement.title: Excellence at the Heart of Our Tradition
quality_statement.paragraph1: At Tazart, quality is not just a promise, it's our daily commitment. Our certifications demonstrate our dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction.
quality_statement.paragraph2: Our production process is regularly audited and certified by independent organizations, ensuring the exceptional quality of our products.

moelleux_dattes.title: Date Soft Cake
moelleux_dattes.description: A delicious soft date cake, perfect for snack time or dessert. A traditional recipe revisited with our premium dates.
instructions: Incorporate flour, baking powder and salt

smoothie_dattes.title: Energetic Date Smoothie
smoothie_dattes.description: A healthy and energizing smoothie, prepared with our premium dates, almond milk and a touch of cinnamon.

barres_energetiques.title: Homemade Energy Bars
barres_energetiques.description: Healthy and natural energy bars, perfect for athletes and food lovers looking for energy.
instructions: Mix until you get a paste

recipes.discover_our_selection: Discover our exclusive selection of recipes showcasing the richness and versatility of our premium dates.

cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience and remember your preferences. By accepting, you allow the use of cookies for a better browsing experience.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us
why_choose_us.subtitle: Discover the reasons that make Tazart the ideal partner for your business
why_choose_us.quality_description: We are committed to offering high-quality products that meet consumer expectations.
why_choose_us.expertise_description: We have a qualified and experienced team.
why_choose_us.service_description: We are always available to support our customers and respond quickly to their requests.

video_section.title: From palm tree to your table
video_section.subtitle: Discover our traditional harvesting process
video_section.quality_description: Discover our passion for quality and excellence. Each date is harvested by hand in our Tunisian oases, following traditional methods that respect the environment and enhance our heritage. Our video takes you to the heart of our palm groves to show you the unique process that has built Tazart's reputation in the international market.

testimonials.testimonial_1: Dates of exceptional quality, you can really feel the difference from those in the supermarket. The taste is incomparable and the customer service is impeccable.
testimonials.testimonial_2: I've been ordering these dates for months and the quality never wavers. They're perfect for both daily consumption and special occasions.
testimonials.testimonial_3: The freshness and natural sweetness of these dates are remarkable. A true delicacy that brings the authentic taste of Tunisia right to your table.
